legal.terms_subtitle: Rules and guidelines for using Dourou
legal.privacy_subtitle: How we protect your personal information
legal.hero_subtitle: We're committed to transparency and protecting your data
legal.terms_acceptance_text: By accessing and using Dourou, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using this application.
legal.terms_service_description_text: Dourou is a digital platform designed to facilitate the management of rotating savings and credit associations (tontines). The application provides tools for creating groups, tracking contributions, managing payment schedules, and maintaining trust scores.
legal.terms_user_obligations_text: Users must provide accurate information, maintain the security of their account credentials, comply with all payment obligations within their tontines, and use the service lawfully without engaging in fraudulent activities.
legal.terms_tontine_rules_text: Tontine creators are responsible for verifying member payments and managing their groups fairly. Members must honor their payment commitments and participate in good faith. The platform facilitates but does not guarantee financial transactions between users.
legal.terms_payment_responsibility_text: All financial transactions occur directly between tontine members. Dourou does not process, hold, or transfer funds. Users are solely responsible for fulfilling their payment obligations and resolving any disputes within their groups.
legal.terms_trust_score_text: The trust score is calculated based on payment history and punctuality. It is intended as a reputation indicator within the community. Dourou makes no guarantees about the reliability of any user based on their trust score.
legal.terms_liability_text: Dourou provides this service 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for financial losses, disputes between members, or any damages arising from the use of this application. Users assume all risks associated with participating in tontines.
legal.terms_termination_text: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms, engage in fraudulent behavior, or misuse the platform. Users may delete their accounts at any time through the application settings.
legal.terms_changes_text: We may update these Terms of Service at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes. Continued use of the application after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
legal.terms_contact_text: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through the application's support channels.
legal.privacy_intro_text: Dourou is committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your data when you use our application.
legal.privacy_data_collection_text: We collect information you provide directly including your name, phone number, email address (optional), tontine participation data, payment declarations, and usage information such as device type and activity logs.
legal.privacy_data_usage_text: Your data is used to provide and improve our services, calculate trust scores, send notifications about tontine activities, prevent fraud and ensure security, and comply with legal obligations.
legal.privacy_phone_masking_text: Phone numbers are masked in shared views to protect your privacy. Other members see a partially hidden version (e.g., +216 •• ••• 123) unless you are the account owner or group administrator.
legal.privacy_data_sharing_text: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. Your data is shared only with tontine members you join, service providers who help us operate the application (with strict confidentiality agreements), and authorities when required by law.
legal.privacy_data_security_text: We implement industry-standard security measures including encrypted data transmission, secure cloud storage, regular security audits, and role-based access controls to protect your information.
legal.privacy_user_rights_text: You have the right to access your personal data, correct inaccurate information, delete your account and associated data, export your data, and opt out of non-essential communications.
legal.privacy_data_retention_text: We retain your data for as long as your account is active. When you delete your account, most personal data is immediately removed. Some information may be retained for legal compliance or dispute resolution for up to 90 days.
legal.privacy_cookies_text: We use minimal tracking technologies necessary for application functionality. We do not use third-party advertising cookies or sell your behavioral data.
legal.privacy_children_text: Dourou is intended for users aged 18 and above. We do not knowingly collect information from minors. If you believe a minor has created an account, please contact us immediately.
legal.privacy_changes_text: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. You will be notified of significant changes through the application. Your continued use after changes indicates acceptance of the updated policy.
legal.privacy_contact_text: If you have questions or concerns about your privacy or this policy, please contact us through the application's support channels or email support@dourou.tn
